term.name: award
term.description: something given to recognize excellence in a certain field

term.name: course
term.description: education imparted in a series of lessons or meetings

term.name: event
term.description: something that happens at a particular place or time as an organized activity with participants or an audience

term.name: investigation
term.description: An activity inquiring into something through thorough, systematic, objective, and scientific methods.

term.name: program
term.description: system of activities intended to meet a public need

term.name: project
term.description: piece of work that is undertaken or attempted, with a start and end date and defined objectives

term.name: catalogueOrIndex
term.description: collection of resource descriptions describing the content of one or more repositories or collective works

term.name: collection
term.description: compiled content created as separate and independent works and assembled into a collective whole for distribution and use

term.name: dataset
term.description: collection of physical or digital objects generated by research activities

term.name: registry
term.description: collection of registry objects compiled to support the business of a given community

term.name: repository
term.description: collection of physical or digital objects compiled for information and documentation purposes and/or for storage and safekeeping

term.name: group
term.description: one or more persons acting as a family, group, association, partnership or corporation

term.name: person
term.description: human being or identity assumed by one or more human beings

term.name: create
term.description: Instrument

term.name: generate
term.description: simulator

term.name: report
term.description: visualisation, summary

term.name: transform
term.description: analysis, conversion

term.name: assemble
term.description: aggregation

term.name: harvest-oaipmh
term.description: OAI-PMH Harvest

term.name: search-http
term.description: Search service over HTTP

term.name: search-opensearch
term.description: OpenSearch search

term.name: search-sru
term.description: SRU search

term.name: search-srw
term.description: SRW search

term.name: search-z3950
term.description: z39.50 search

term.name: syndicate-atom
term.description: ATOM syndication

term.name: syndicate-rss
term.description: RSS feed

term.name: brief
term.description: short account for selection purposes

term.name: full
term.description: full account

term.name: logo
term.description: symbol used as an identifying mark

term.name: rights
term.description: (collections only) information about rights held in and over the collection

term.name: accessRights
term.description: (collections and services) information about access rights to the collection or service

term.name: deliverymethod
term.description: (services only) information about how the service is delivered. Should be one of: webservice, software, offline, workflow

term.name: significanceStatement
term.description: (collections only) a statement describing the significance of a collection within its domain or context

term.name: gml
term.description: OpenGIS Geography Markup Language (GML) Encoding Standard

term.name: gpx
term.description: the GPS Exchange Format

term.name: dcmiPoint
term.description: DCMI Box notation derived from bounding box metadata conformant with the iso19139 schema

term.name: iso31661
term.description: ISO 3166-1 Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions - Part 1: Country codes

term.name: iso31662
term.description: Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions - Part 2: Country subdivision codes

term.name: kml
term.description: Keyhole Markup Language developed for use with Google Earth

term.name: dcmiPoint
term.description: spatial location information specified in DCMI Point notation

term.name: text
term.description: free-text representation of spatial location

term.name: streetAddress
term.description: address where an entity is physically located

term.name: postalAddress
term.description: address where mail for an entity should be sent

term.name: Activity Relation Type
term.description: RIF-CS Activity Relation Type

term.name: hasAssociationWith
term.description: has an unspecified relationship with the related activity

term.name: hasOutput
term.description: delivers materials in the related collection

term.name: hasPart
term.description: contains the related activity

term.name: hasParticipant
term.description: is undertaken by the related party

term.name: isFundedBy
term.description: receives monetary or in-kind aid from the related program

term.name: isManagedBy
term.description: is organised and/or delivered by the related party

term.name: isOwnedBy
term.description: legally belongs to the related party

term.name: isPartOf
term.description: is contained in the related activity

term.name: Collection Relation Type
term.description: RIF-CS Collection Relation Type

term.name: hasAssociationWith
term.description: has an unspecified relationship with the related activity

term.name: hasOutput
term.description: delivers materials in the related collection

term.name: hasPart
term.description: contains the related activity

term.name: hasParticipant
term.description: is undertaken by the related party

term.name: isFundedBy
term.description: receives monetary or in-kind aid from the related program

term.name: isManagedBy
term.description: is organised and/or delivered by the related party

term.name: isOwnedBy
term.description: legally belongs to the related party

term.name: isPartOf
term.description: is contained in the related activity

term.name: isEnrichedBy
term.description: additional value provided to a collection by a party.

term.name: hasDerivedCollection
term.description: the related collection is derived from the collection, e.g. through analysis

term.name: isDerivedFrom
term.description: collection is derived from the related collection, e.g. through analysis

term.name: Party Relation Type
term.description: RIF-CS Party Relation Type

term.name: hasAssociationWith
term.description: has an unspecified relationship with the related activity

term.name: hasOutput
term.description: delivers materials in the related collection

term.name: hasPart
term.description: contains the related activity

term.name: hasParticipant
term.description: is undertaken by the related party

term.name: isFundedBy
term.description: receives monetary or in-kind aid from the related program

term.name: isManagedBy
term.description: is organised and/or delivered by the related party

term.name: isOwnedBy
term.description: legally belongs to the related party

term.name: isPartOf
term.description: is contained in the related activity

term.name: enriches
term.description: provides additional value to a collection

term.name: Service Relation Type
term.description: RIF-CS Service Relation Type

term.name: hasAssociationWith
term.description: has an unspecified relationship with the related activity

term.name: hasPart
term.description: contains the related activity

term.name: isManagedBy
term.description: is organised and/or delivered by the related party

term.name: isOwnedBy
term.description: legally belongs to the related party

term.name: isPartOf
term.description: is contained in the related activity

term.name: isSupportedBy
term.description: enables contribution and access to and use of the related collection

term.name: isAvailableThrough
term.description: specialisation of isSupportBy type - for Harvest, Search and Syndicate

term.name: makesAvailable
term.description: specialisation of supports type - for Harvest, Search and Syndicate

term.name: isProducedBy
term.description: specialisation of isSupportBy type - for Create, Generate and Assemble

term.name: produces
term.description: specialisation of supports type - for Create, Generate and Assemble

term.name: isPresentedBy
term.description: specialisation of isSupportBy type - for Report

term.name: presents
term.description: specialisation of supports type - for Report

term.name: isOperatedOnBy
term.description: specialisation of isSupportBy type - for Transform

term.name: operatesOn
term.description: specialisation of supports type - for Transform

term.name: addsValueTo
term.description: specialisation of isSupportBy type - for Annotate

term.name: hasValueAddedBy
term.description: specialisation of supports type - for Annotate

vocabulary.name: RIF-CS Physical Address Part Type
vocabulary.description: RIF-CS Physical Address Part Type Vocabulary

term.name: addressLine
term.description: an address part that is a separate line of a structured address

term.name: text
term.description: a single address part that contains the whole address in unstructured form

term.name: telephoneNumber
term.description: an address part that contains a telephone number including a mobile telephone number. This maps to AS 4590-2006 6.4.6 element 'Telephone number'.

term.name: faxNumber
term.description: an address part that contains a fax (facsimile) number. This maps to AS 4590-2006 6.4.6 element 'Telephone number', where the AS 4590-2006 6.4.2 element, 'Telephone standard functionality code' has been encoded as '02' for Facsimile (FAX).

term.name: primary
term.description: official name of the registry object

term.name: abbreviated
term.description: shortened form of, or acronym for, the official name

term.name: alternative
term.description: any other form of name used now or in the past as a substitute or alternative for the official name

term.name: title
term.description: word or phrase indicative of rank, office, nobility, honour, etc., or a term of address associated with a person

term.name: given
term.description: forenames or given or Christian names or initials

term.name: family
term.description: last name or surname

term.name: suffix
term.description: honours, awards, qualifications and other identifiers conferred

term.name: abn
term.description: Australian Business Number

term.name: arc
term.description: Australian Research Council identifier

term.name: ark
term.description: ARK Persistent Identifier Scheme

term.name: doi
term.description: Digital Object Identifier

term.name: handle
term.description: HANDLE System Identifier

term.name: infouri
term.description: 'info' URI scheme

term.name: isil
term.description: International Standard Identifier for Libraries

term.name: local
term.description: identifer unique within a local context

term.name: purl
term.description: Persistent Uniform Resource Locator

term.name: uri
term.description: Uniform Resource Identifier

term.name: email
term.description: string used to receive messages by means of a computer network

term.name: fax
term.description: string used to receive scanned images of documents via telephone lines

term.name: other
term.description: other electronic address

term.name: url
term.description: Uniform Resource Locator

term.name: voice
term.description: string used to recieve calls by means of a telephone line or computer network

term.name: wsdl
term.description: (service only) Web Service Definition Language

term.name: string
term.description: (service only) Indicates the value of an argument is a plain text string

term.name: object
term.description: indicates the value of an argument is an object, most likely in serialized form

term.name: inline
term.description: (service only) indicates the argument forms part of the base URL

term.name: keyValue
term.description: (service only) indicates the argument is passed using key=value pairings in the query component of a URL

term.name: keyword
term.description: Uncontrolled keyword or keyword from a local vocabulary

term.description: ANZSRC Field of Research

term.name: Socio-Ecomomic Objective
term.description: ANZSRC Socio-Ecomomic Objective

term.name: Type of Activity
term.description: ANZSRC Type of Activity
